thread.title: SB Energy to Build 13.9MW Solar Plant in Tochigi
thread.title_full: SB Energy to Build 13.9MW Solar Plant in Tochigi

title: SB Energy to Build 13.9MW Solar Plant in Tochigi
text:
SB Energy to Build 13.9MW Solar Plant in Tochigi SB Energy to Build 13.9MW Solar Plant in Tochigi 2015/10/18 14:54 Kenji Kaneko, Nikkei BP CleanTech Institute An image of the solar power plant in Nasushiobara City 
SB Energy Corp announced Oct 1, 2015, that it has decided to build a 13.9MW solar power plant in Nasushiobara City, Tochigi Prefecture, Japan. 
SB Energy will carry out the project after performing an environmental assessment in accordance with ordinances and taking measures for environmental protection. The company started the construction of the plant Oct 1, 2015, aiming to start operation in early December 2016. 
Sharp Corp and Sanyo Engineering & Construction Inc provide EPC (engineering, procurement and construction) services for the plant. Sharp also provides solar panels and mounting systems while Fuji Electric Co Ltd supplies PV inverters.
